body: No matter which time period or universe, one thing will never change.. girls suffering from rape trauma are never taken seriously.

Sometimes, this Saint Foire just want to make me drink.

But then finishing it, I can help but be giddy that true love transcend little shits like NTR and rapings. Yay?
I think it would be good a second part where rapists make them suffer the same apart from a castration
